info.title: Close/Restart Game
info.author: Lynx64
info.description: Restart or close a game shortcut plugin
info.details:
Restart or close a game from the plugin config menu, even while the HOME Button Menu is inaccessible (you may not notice this at first as the options aren't shown in the Wii U Menu).

Also adds button shortcuts to close or restart to the HOME Button Menu (press X to close, hold X to restart). These can be disabled in the settings.

Usage:
Open the plugin config menu by pressing L, DPAD Down and Minus on the GamePad, Pro Controller or Classic Controller, or B, DPAD Down and Minus on a Wii Remote.

'Press X to close' is disabled by default to avoid accidental presses.

changelog:
0.4

Adds option to delete the current game's save data for the current user. Hidden by default.
Adds option to temporarily show the delete save data options.
Defaults and resets to false/hidden each time the plugin is loaded.
You will need to reopen the plugin menu after enabling.
Adds notification support to display the status (success/failure) of a delete.

0.3

Update to WUPS 0.8.1.
Add game option to manage save data (jumps to System Settings Data Management).
(Normally you will require a GamePad so I recommend the Better Settings plugin so you can also use a Pro Controller.)
Add Shutdown option.
Option to Launch Menu directly (no splash) (calls "LaunchMenuFromHomeButtonMenu" functions).
(Only use case I've found is sometimes it will load slightly faster.)

0.2

Further improvements to overall stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience.
The config menu options are now shown in homebrew.
Lowered the time to hold to restart on the HBM.
